alert.note: Alert for Northern Carbon; Northern Stillwater; Red Lodge Foothills; Southeastern Carbon (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 2:10PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Stillwater and central Carbon Counties through 245 PM MDT... At 209 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles southeast of Absarokee, or 15 miles north of Red Lodge, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail, along with brief heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bridger, Joliet, Fromberg, Cooney Reservoir State Park, Roberts and Boyd. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
